title: What do you get an A-lister who has everything?
text:
Husbands and boyfriends take note: there’s a new chore on the to-do list. It’s right there in between “take out bins” and “pick up your own bloody socks”: “pen and post emotive birthday eulogy stressing just how much you love me… alongside my various mental and physical attributes.”

Kanye West produced a whole ‘tribute video’ for his wife Kim Kardashian while Jessica Alba’s husband is famous for his Instagram birthday eulogies. But it’s Gwyneth Paltrow’s husband, Brad Falchuk, who wins spouse of the year for the When Harry Met Sally-esque paen he posted on the Goop-founder’s instagram on her 47th birthday at the weekend.

After she put up a picture of three generations of Paltrow’s on instagram...
